PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08572012-06-19,  EC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Sulphur in Diesel Fuel Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SULPHUR IN DIESEL FUEL REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow for the production, import and sale of diesel fuel in Canada with a maximum sulphur content of 1 000 mg/kg for use in large vessels; (2) align sulphur for diesel fuel produced, imported and sold for use in stationary engines with those of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency; and (3) revise several administrative requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0135 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
AttachmentsAttachment
